ModMetaData.name: Pathfinding Framework
ModMetaData.author: José Ángel Soler Ortiz
ModMetaData.description: Pathfinding Framework Ever wished your colonists could do more than just walk? With the Pathfinding Framework mod, they can! The mod introduces a variety of new movement types, allowing pawns to move across the world in entirely new ways. • Diverse movement types: Introduces a variety of movement types, including aquatic, flying, and drilling. • Terrain interaction: Pawns intelligently interact with terrains based on their movement type. Watch as birds effortlessly fly over obstacles or fish navigate through deep waters. • Extensible framework for modders: Modders can easily patch movement type support for their pawns, apparel genes or other items, or even integrate and define custom movement types. • Compatible and performance-friendly: Designed to play well with other mods and optimized for smooth gameplay.
